text: And he set the Levites in the house of the LORD with cymbals, with psalteries, and with harps, according to the commandment of David, and of Gad the kingâ€™s seer, and Nathan the prophet: for so was the commandment of the LORD by his prophets.29.25 commandment of the LORD: Heb. commandment by the hand of the LORD29.25 by: Heb. by the hand of
